DOC.detailed_description: Thirty patient select study group two group , group contains fifteen patient . Group 1 : study group ( retrieval 7 egg ) . Group 2 : control group ( retrieval egg ) . Study hold compare two arm , proportion patient prevent progression severe OHSS interventional method .
DOC.criteria: 1 . More 9 day induction ovulation . 2 . Each ovary contains 20 follicle . 3 . The majority follicles > 14mm diameter . 4 . Mild fluid Douglas pouch . 5 . The patient start complain considerable low abdominal pain egg collection . 1 . Recurrent ICSI failure bad obstetric history . 2 .
